page.title: 09Little Westfield Farm Cottam
page.content: I am Louise Burton.I live at{Little {Westfield Farm,}Cottam near Langtoft. We own 200 acres and 6 fields.We have one dryer shed, a grain mill,and a few storage houses.We have some very old buildings.My dad is growing 97 acres of barley,54 acres of wheat,37 acres of grass and 12 acres of peas.We have 737 sheep including lambs and rams mostly Suffolk Crosses, a few Mules and Massams.We have{270}ewes ,{7}rams and{460}lambs.We breed them.We shear them once a year, normally in June. Then we dip them in July because they get fly eggs and maggots in their wool We have to cut their hooves like you cut your nails. The rams have to go to market get sold or killed for meat!My dad has go spraying,combining,baling and feeding the animals.He gets up early!We have 2 Fords and 1 Massey Ferguson tractor.We have 1 employee.
